txt.en: If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Falathlorn following the defeat of the Dourhands, speak with Nos Grimsong.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the introduction is complete.</rgb>

If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Falathlorn following the defeat of the Dourhands, speak with Nos Grimsong again.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
Allows you to skip directly through all newbie experiences into the main portion of the game.
Talk to Nos Grimsong to skip the Introduction
If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Falathlorn following the defeat of the Dourhands, speak with Nos Grimsong.
<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the introduction is complete</rgb>
